relationships.description: Professor Flitwick announced that the class was ready to start making objects fly on Hallowe'en morning.
Neville's toad was made by Professor Flitwick to zoom around the classroom.
Seamus Finnigan was Harry's partner in class.
Ron was working with Hermione Granger in class.
